alert.note: Alert for South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:45PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tulare County through 215 PM PST... At 142 PM PST, the public reported a thunderstorm over Terra Bella, or 8 miles south of Porterville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and ice pellets, possibly accumulating along surfaces and roadways before melting. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Terra Bella and Ducor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief cold air funnel clouds. These type of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 30 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
